column6: THE ADAMANTIUM MEN PART 1 In Colombia, whole villages have been slaughtered by a team of soldiers who move through the shadows like ghosts. When Logan learns that Weapon X secrets have leaked, he sets out to find a connection!
column8: | writer:Jason Aaron | other:Chris Eliopoulos | other:Ron Garney | other:Rian Hughes | colorist:Jason Keith | letterer:Cory Petit
